ygData.msgSnippet: Inferno looked at Quasar, We will have the glory of fighting back the Rebel invaders when they strike, if they do. He said, and then marched away as Hell

    Inferno looked at Quasar, "We will have the glory of fighting back the 
Rebel invaders when they strike, if they do." He said, and then marched away 
as Hell Beast approached Quasar.
    "Would you be so kind as to help Tarantulas with the computer system he 
has access to. Its not the main uplink, but gives us access to simple, but 
important, ship functions." He said, with a sly smile on his face. "Are you 
formatted for technical operations, or are you more formatted for conflict 
situations?"
